    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Človek-Kaj potrebuje in kako deluje?</string>
            <string language="en">Human - needs and activities</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlich - Notwendigkeiten und Aktivitäten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Humain - les besoins et activités</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humano - necessidades e atividades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Umano - bisogni ed attività</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρώπινος - ανάγκες και δραστηριότητες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humano - necesidades y actividades</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V 4. razredu obravnavamo človeško telo. S sliko in animacijo učencem lažje predstavimo, kaj človeško telo potrebuje za svoje življenje in kako deluje. Predstavitev lahko uporabimo pred obravnavo učnega sklopa za motivacijo ali po obravnavi za utrjevanje.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of human body, its needs, activities, how does it work, ... impulses/inputs from environment, outputs, ...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">človek</string>
            <string language="en">human</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">človeško telo</string>
            <string language="en">human body</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hrana</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">voda</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zrak</string>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung des menschlichen Körpers, seine 
Notwendigkeiten, Aktivitäten, wie es funktioniert... impulses/inputs 
von der Umgebung, Ausgaben...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de corps humain, ses besoins, 
activités, comment cela fonctionne... impulses/inputs 
d'environnement, sorties...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação do corpo humano, suas 
necessidades, atividades, como trabalha... impulses/inputs do 
ambiente, saídas...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione del corpo umano, i relativi 
bisogni, attività, come funziona... impulses/inputs dall'ambiente, 
uscite...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση του ανθρώπινου σώματος, οι ανάγκες του, 
δραστηριότητες, πώς λειτουργεί... ωθήσεις/είσοδοι από το 
περιβάλλον, αποτελέσματα...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación del cuerpo humano, sus necesidades,
actividades, cómo trabaja... impulses/inputs del ambiente, 
salidas...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschlich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschlicher Körper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
